solution.text:
The ratio of two numbers is 2:5.The ratio can be written in fraction form as \(\frac {2}{5}\).
Therefore , any of the following numbers that can be represented in the same ratio can be possible -
\( \frac {_{{2*j}}_}{_{{5*j}}_} \) = 2:5
\( \frac {_{{12*j}}_}{_{{30*j}}_} \) = 2:5
The other two cannot be represented in the same ratio.

content.text: The ratio of two numbers is 2:5. Which of these can represent the two numbers ?
